Yep, I found the point where buying intelligence for slime is free.

Side note: there really oughta be some kind of test for determining 
stats so that you don't end up with negative mana or health values for 
character playing a scenario.

Apparantly, experience level 35 faeries are a bit of challenge to my 
super team, which, for the most part, has characters above experience 
level 410.
